# syndrome

**Instance Property**

The vCPU exception syndrome causing the exception.

## Declaration

```swift
var syndrome: hv_exception_syndrome_t
```

## Instance Properties

- **physical_address**: The intermediate physical address of the exception in the client.
- **virtual_address**: The vCPU virtual address of the exception.

items.description: The intermediate physical address of the exception in the client.
